title: True Caesar salad
ingredients: ['1 cos (romaine) lettuce', '180ml extra virgin olive oil', '3 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/4 tablespoon mustard powder', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '1 egg', '1 lemon, juiced', 'freshly ground black pepper', '4 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '170g garlic croutons', '1 (60g) tin anchovy fillets']
